title: World is on brink of 50 year ICE AGE
text: Posts: 1,527 World is on brink of 50 year ICE AGE Time for Loonwinded to take a break from his lucrative electrical contracting business and start trolling this thread! LOL! Talent on loan from god Location: Ohio Posts: 18,134 Laughable. Your Right wing article attributed no one specifically making that claim nor their rational to support such a claim. You might as well have passed gas instead. At least that would have been more productive. Quote: Originally Posted by Camelot Laughable. Your Right wing article attributed no one specifically making that claim nor their rational to support such a claim. You might as well have passed gas instead. At least that would have been more productive. And COF to start trolling the thread!!! LOL! You couldn't even get through high school! LOL!
